Class FormulaFunctions

    • com.epoch.chem.FormulaFunctions

    public final class FormulaFunctions
extends Object
implements ChemConstants, FormulaConstants, LewisConstants
    Contains formula matching and calculation functions.

      • hasFormula

        public static boolean hasFormula(Molecule respMol,
                                 String authFormulaStr,
                                 int numRGroups)
                          throws FormulaException
        Determines if the response molecule's formula is the same as the author's formula. No order of atoms is assumed for the formula. Author's formula is of the form (([A-Z][a-z]*)(\*?|[0-9]*))+ or an exception is thrown. D and T are treated as different from H only if the author's formula contains D or T. Other isotopes are not considered.
        Parameters:
        respMol - a response molecule
        authFormulaStr - reference formula to which to compare; asterisk has a value -1 and will match against any number ≥ 0.
        numRGroups - number of R groups included in the formula; equals the number of spurious H atoms in authFormulaStr due to dangling valences in R groups; if negative, this is a Lewis structure
        Returns:
        true if the molecular formula is same as authFormulaStr
        Throws:
        FormulaException - if a formula doesn't match the pattern for a formula or if an element symbol is invalid

        public static int countCAtoms(Molecule mol)
        Counts the number of C atoms in a compound.
        Parameters:

        Parameters:
        mol - a molecule

        Returns:

      • countAtoms

        public static int countAtoms(Molecule mol,
                             String elem)
        Counts the number of atoms of an element in a compound. D and T atoms are counted among H atoms when the H atom count is requested.
        Parameters:
        mol - a molecule
        elem - element to count
        Returns:
        number of atoms of the element

      • countAtoms

        public static int countAtoms(Molecule mol,
                             String elem,
                             boolean isLewis)
        Counts the number of atoms of an element in a compound. Specific isotopes are included in the total atom count if no isotope is specified by the author.
        Parameters:
        mol - a molecule
        elem - element to count; may be any (X) or an isotope
        isLewis - is a Lewis structure
        Returns:
        number of atoms of the element

      • countContiguousCAtoms

        public static int countContiguousCAtoms(Molecule mol)
        Counts the largest number of contiguous C atoms.
        Parameters:
        mol - a molecule
        Returns:
        the largest number of contiguous C atoms

      • countContiguous

        public static int countContiguous(Molecule mol,
                                  String element)
        Counts the largest number of contiguous atoms of an element.
        Parameters:
        mol - a molecule
        element - symbol of element to look for
        Returns:
        the largest number of contiguous atoms of the element

      • countContiguous

        private static int countContiguous(Molecule mol,
                                   int atom0Idx,
                                   boolean[] beenThere,
                                   String element,
                                   int numContiguous)
        Counts the largest number of contiguous atoms of an element starting from a particular atom. This method is called recursively.
        Parameters:
        mol - a molecule
        atom0Idx - index of an atom of the element we're looking for
        beenThere - array in which each position corresponds to the index of an atom; that element is true if the corresponding atom has already been examined for being part of a contiguous region
        element - symbol of element to look for
        numContiguous - the number of contiguous atoms of the element recursively counted so far
        Returns:
        the number of contiguous atoms of the element that contain atom0

      • getExplicitAtomCount

        public static int getExplicitAtomCount(Molecule mol)
        Returns the number of real atoms in the compound, omitting shortcut groups and multicenter attachment points and excluding implicit H atoms.
        Parameters:
        mol - a molecule
        Returns:
        the number of real atoms in the compound, excluding implicit H atoms

      • getAtomCount

        public static int getAtomCount(Molecule mol)
        Returns the number of real atoms in the compound, omitting shortcut groups and multicenter attachment points, and including implicit H atoms.
        Parameters:
        mol - a molecule
        Returns:
        the number of real atoms and implicit H atoms in the compound
